name: BOOOST Enhanced
description:
Made in 48 hours for for Ludm Dare 34 #LD34

It landed #72 Overall of LD34! :D

--------------------------------

  • Only two buttons to control. A and D!
  • Go faster to escape the boss!
  • Rest your boosters to let them build their reserves!
  • Boosting together grants you a brief melee-range force boom!
  • Pick up Space Batteries to charge your boosters mid-burn!
  • There *is* an end, and I've reached it... It's *still* VERY hard.

--------------------------------

This is the post-compo version where I changed up a few things and refined some more, hopefully for the better :)

Changes include:

  • Instead of some random flame, you're chased by a BOSS MONSTER!
  • Handling of the player ship changed, should be more responsive. (Let me know how it feels!)
  • Single fuel bar
  • Flying sideways doesn't cost fuel, boosting up does.
  • If you have more than 50% fuel, shield boost (invincibility!) is enabled.
  • There is an initial chunk of fuel cost to the shield boost.

-------------------------------
